Class CustomerView

java.lang.Object
CSC540.WolfWR.views.CustomerView
@Transactional @Component public class CustomerView extends Object
The CustomerView class provides the customer interface for interacting with the store. This includes viewing and selecting a member, making a purchase, selecting stores, and adding merchandise to the cart. The customer can also proceed to checkout and complete their purchase.

This class uses services such as StoreService, MerchandiseService, TransactionService, and MemberService to interact with the business logic and persist data.

      public CustomerView()

  • Method Details

    • view

      public void view(Scanner scan)
      Displays the customer view, prompting the user to sign in by selecting their account and then presenting options to make a purchase or return to the home page.
      Parameters:
      scan - The Scanner object used to take user input.

    • makePurchase

      @Transactional public void makePurchase(Scanner scan, Member active)
      Allows a customer to make a purchase by selecting a store, adding merchandise to the cart, and proceeding to checkout. The purchase is then completed with the total price calculated and the transaction saved.
      Parameters:
      scan - The Scanner object used to take user input.
      active - The active Member making the purchase.

    • getNewTransaction

      public Transaction getNewTransaction(Store s, Member m)
      Creates a new transaction for the active member at the selected store.
      Parameters:
      s - The Store where the transaction is taking place.
      m - The Member making the transaction.
      Returns:
      The created Transaction object, or null if no cashiers are available.
